snippet: Sixteen years after he reached over the wall during the A.L.C.S., Jeffrey Maier is still fielding phone calls.
lead_paragraph: Sixteen years after he reached over the wall during the A.L.C.S., Jeffrey Maier is still fielding phone calls.

headline.seo: As Yankees Face Orioles, Jeffrey Maier Reflects on a Stolen Moment
headline.main: In Rematch, Memories of a Stolen Moment
headline.print_headline: In Rematch, Memories Of a Stolen Moment
